alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson; Marshall (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:19PM CDT until July 02 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Marshall County in northeastern Alabama... Southeastern Jackson County in northeastern Alabama... DeKalb County in northeastern Alabama... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 319 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ider to Sylvania to 8 miles west of Geraldine, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albertville, Fort Payne, Boaz, Guntersville, Rainsville, Henagar, Crossville, Sylvania, Fyffe and Powell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
